github pages + jekyll = awesome

It was around 7/29/2013, I decided to give Jekyll a shot to make blog site. And it took me some time to figure out what to do, how to use the jekyll sutff. And I decided to make a site you can fork and use it right away. I am planning on making many different styles that can be run properly with github pages.
